function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of contagious diseases such as tuberculosis, measles, chickenpox, SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV, RSV, and influenza.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection in indoor environments, especially during close contact situations.","Mitigation":"Improving indoor air ventilation, using air filtration systems, and promoting mask-wearing and hand hygiene.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C germicidal lamps, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters.","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, healthcare workers, infants, and individuals in close contact with infected individuals.","Owner":"Building owners, healthcare facilities, public health authorities, and individuals."}]}
